entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:00 a.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
